name: Rendezvous Hotel Brisbane Anzac Square

reviews.text: The Rendezvous, as other people have mentioned, is exceptionally well located being opposite Central Station and up the road from the CBD and shopping districts of Brisbane. The rooms are large and comfortable with a seperate TV in the bedroom of the 1 bedroom apartments. Broadband internet available (AUD20/day) and valet parking. The only downside of the hotel is the lack of paytv, but this shouldn't be an issue in Brisbane as you should be wondering what you are doing inside (Beautiful One Day, Perfect the Next).
reviews.title: Grand old building

reviews.text: Classic old building in the city center that has been converted in a hotel, easy access to everything, train opposite, city cat within 10-15 min. walk, Queen Street Mall 2 blocks away.
reviews.title: A Good Choice
Great way to finish a trip
reviews.text: Very professional check in staff, pleasant and friendly.

I had a standard room with contained a microwave and an actual kitchen sink, (amazing how handy a kitchen sink becomes in a hotel room) much better than filling the kettle and washing the coffee cups in the bathroom sink.
reviews.title: Nice motel, good location
No Comment
reviews.text: Rooms have high ceilings that gives a feeling of space and are nice and clean and plenty of natural light.

We stayed at the Rendezvous Hotel Brisbane in 2002 and will stay there again this year. The apartments were spacious and nicely appointed. Everything was clean and very comfortable. I'd say well above average. We have found it very affortable as the hotel offers specials through their own website. The location was excellent, very close to the CBD and a train station. Even with it's central location the rooms were very quiet (my husband is very sensitive to noise). The one bedroom apartment came with a kitchen, and a washer/dryer (new). We had a wonderful stay and as I said will stay there again.
reviews.title: Very nice

description: Rendezvous Hotel Brisbane Anzac Square is a modern hotel located in the heart of Brisbane’s central business district. Overlooking the Anzac Square memorial gardens and directly opposite Central Railway Station, our superb location gives you direct access to the best that Brisbane has to offer. Whether you are travelling for business or leisure, you will appreciate having Queen Street Mall, Treasury Casino and South Bank all within walking distance.
